body: Boy on page 13 is me reading this back after I finished nutting
Dear journal, i became a monster today and i don't care.......(AWAKENING)
To be honest this really just depressed me.
They liked it at the end, so it's not rape.
I mostly stick to traps, tbh, fam...but the comments here prove this is gonna be gud.

I accepted being a monster and a human scum the moment I fapped my first Lolicon rape. This is just another one on my black and hidden parts of the history of my life. 
BRING IT OOONNN!!!!! I FEAR NO HENTAI!!!!!!!!!
If you don't like bbm or rape, you can just blacklist the tags.
I dont typically give a fuck what is going on as long as its drawn well, but I came to terms with being a monster long ago.

Although I am more of a vanilla, and anti-bbm(some bbm are good though) kind of a guy, just because an artist draws in a genre that is not to your liking, does not mean that he/she fucked it up. Not everyone has the same tastes/fetishes as you, you know...

No, they don't "fuck it up", like it or not, these kind of works are the best and most popular out there, we already have TONS and TONS of bland and boring vanilla lolicon being released every month, also, Mochi is known for hardcore lolicon stuff, every work has rape, dilf, bbm and other stuff, so i don't know what you guys were looking for.
Same here, some of the best loli artists fuck it up by doing that. :/
i like this artist but not his bbm and rape stuff kek
